com.zepl.challenge.rest

Class ToDoRestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zepl.challenge.rest.ToDoRestController

  • @Path(value="/todos")
 @Controller
public class ToDoRestController
extends java.lang.Object
    A REST implementation of the todo service. Topology A Todo is a container of a list of Tasks. You can imagine a structure like this: - TODO - Task1 - Task2 - task3 - etc

        public ToDoRestController()

    • Method Detail

      • createToDo

        @POST
 @Path(value="")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response createToDo(java.lang.String toDoNameJson)
        Create a new todo by name in json format. Identity of the todo is auto generated, Created time is taken from system current time. POST /todos Create a new todo
        Parameters:
        toDoNameJson - name of the todo in json format { "name": "Name of the todo" }
        Returns:
        HTTP Response for the create operation Payload will look like this

        { "id": "84569ae0-bc41-11e6-a4a6-cec0c932ce03", "name": "Todo name", "created": "2016-12-07 05:42:29.809" }

      • createToDoTask

        @POST
 @Path(value="/{ID_TODO}/tasks")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response createToDoTask(@PathParam(value="ID_TODO")
                                                                                                                               java.lang.String idTodo,
                                                                                                                               java.lang.String nameDescriptionTaskJson)
        Create a new task for the given todo. Name and description of task are taken from json string. Identity of the task is auto generated, Created time is taken from system current time. Default status is NOT-DONE. POST /todos/:todo_id/tasks
        Parameters:
        idTodo - identity of the todo
        nameDescriptionTaskJson - name and description of the task in json format { "name": "Name of the task", "description": "description of the task" }
        Returns:
        HTTP Response for the create operation Payload will look like this { "id": "84569ae0-bc41-11e6-a4a6-cec0c932ce03", "name": "Task name", "description": "Description of the task", "status": "NOT_DONE", "created": "2016-12-07 05:42:29.809" }

      • getTodos

        @GET
 @Path(value="")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getTodos()
        Get a list of known todos as a json formatted list GET /todos Get a list of Todos
        Returns:
        HTTP Response and a json formatted list of todos Payload will look like this

        [ { "id": "84569ae0-bc41-11e6-a4a6-cec0c932ce01", "name": "Todo name", "created": "2016-12-07 05:42:29.809" } ]

      • getTodoTasks

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{ID_TODO}/tasks")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getTodoTasks(@PathParam(value="ID_TODO")
                                                                                                                            java.lang.String idTodo)
        GET /todos/:todo_id/tasks Get todo tasks
        Parameters:
        idTodo - id of a todo to get list of the todo tasks.
        Returns:
        HTTP Response and a json formatted list of tasks belong to a todo Payload will look like this

        [ { "id": "84569ae0-bc41-11e6-a4a6-cec0c932ce03", "name": "task name", "description": "Description of the task", "status": "NOT_DONE", "created": "2016-12-07 05:42:29.809" } ]

      • getTodoTasksDone

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{ID_TODO}/tasks/done")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getTodoTasksDone(@PathParam(value="ID_TODO")
                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String idTodo)
        GET /todos/:todo_id/tasks/done Get a list of task that are done
        Parameters:
        idTodo - id of a todo to get list of the tasks.
        Returns:
        HTTP Response and a json formatted list of done tasks belong to a todo Payload will look like this

        [ { "id": "84569ae0-bc41-11e6-a4a6-cec0c932ce03", "name": "task name", "description": "Description of the task", "status": "DONE", "created": "2016-12-07 05:42:29.809" } ]

      • getTodoTasksNotDone

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{ID_TODO}/tasks/not-done")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getTodoTasksNotDone(@PathParam(value="ID_TODO")
                                                                                                                                            java.lang.String idTodo)
        GET /todos/:todo_id/tasks/not-done Get a list of task that are done
        Parameters:
        idTodo - id of a todo to get list of the tasks.
        Returns:
        HTTP Response code and a json formatted list of not-done tasks belong to a todo Payload will look like this

        [ { "id": "84569ae0-bc41-11e6-a4a6-cec0c932ce03", "name": "task name", "description": "Description of the task", "status": "NOT_DONE", "created": "2016-12-07 05:42:29.809" } ]

      • updateTodoTask

        @PUT
 @Path(value="/{ID_TODO}/tasks/{ID_TASK}")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response updateTodoTask(@PathParam(value="ID_TODO")
                                                                                                                                        java.lang.String idTodo,
                                                                                                                                        @PathParam(value="ID_TASK")
                                                                                                                                        java.lang.String idTask,
                                                                                                                                        java.lang.String nameDescriptionStatusTaskJson)
        PUT /todos/:todo_id/tasks/:task_id Update task with 3 properties from json string.
        Parameters:
        idTodo - id of a todo
        idTask - id of a task belong to the todo
        nameDescriptionStatusTaskJson - as json format { "name": "Name of the task", "description": "description of the task", "status": "DONE" }
        Returns:
        HTTP Response code and a json formatted of the updated task Payload will look like this

        { "id": "84569ae0-bc41-11e6-a4a6-cec0c932ce03", "name": "Task name", "description": "Description of the task", "status": "DONE", "created": "2016-12-07 05:42:29.809" }

      • deleteTodo

        @DELETE
 @Path(value="/{ID_TODO}")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response deleteTodo(@PathParam(value="ID_TODO")
                                                                                 java.lang.String idTodo)
        DELETE /todos/:todo_id Remove a todo and related tasks
        Parameters:
        idTodo - todo identity
        Returns:
        HTTP Repsonse code for the delete operation and empty body

      • deleteTask

        @DELETE
 @Path(value="/{ID_TODO}/tasks/{ID_TASK}")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response deleteTask(@PathParam(value="ID_TODO")
                                                                                                 java.lang.String idTodo,
                                                                                                 @PathParam(value="ID_TASK")
                                                                                                 java.lang.String idTask)
        DELETE /todos/:todo_id/tasks/:task_id Remove a todo task
        Parameters:
        idTodo - todo identity
        idTask - task identity
        Returns:
        HTTP Repsonse code for the delete operation and empty body

      • getTask

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{ID_TODO}/tasks/{ID_TASK}")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getTask(@PathParam(value="ID_TODO")
                                                                                                                                 java.lang.String idTodo,
                                                                                                                                 @PathParam(value="ID_TASK")
                                                                                                                                 java.lang.String idTask)
        GET /todos/:todo_id/tasks/:task_id Get a todo task

        idTodo - todo identity
        idTask - task identity
        Returns:
